Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 1 Start event Receive invoice by email 2 Task 1 Validate Invoice PO number If no PO number present Send request to Supplier for details Karen might be involved if needed But Mary says she sends it back to supplier Actually reading transcripts Mary When we receive an invoice I check if its associated with a valid purchase order If not I send it back to the supplier requesting more details This is the initial decision gateway 3 Task 2 Log invoice into accounting system if valid PO 4 Task 3 Forward invoice to Purchasing department for confirmation that goodsservices received But note from Dans transcript When invoice hits my inbox from AP I check if it matches what we ordered Compare quantities prices etc Also If PO missing then ask Mary to get PO reference so there is a decision point on whether the invoice details match 5 Task 4 Confirm receipt of goods and that invoice matches PO Or maybe separate tasks Mary does matching then send to department manager for approval after confirmation But process flow might be

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Process Start event Invoice arrives via email Step A Validate PO number Accounts Payable Clerk Mary If PO missing then gateway No PO path Task Request additional details from supplier Mary sends back invoice to supplier Supplier Relationship Manager may be contacted if needed Loop Wait but in transcript what happens when invoice doesnt have a PO Mary says I send it back to the supplier requesting more details Then presumably if further details are received then process continues If valid PO Step B Log invoice into accounting system Mary Task C Forward invoice to Purchasing department for confirmation Mary does that Step D Purchase officer Dan receives invoice in email from AP Task Check if invoice details line up with the purchase order PO compare quantities prices etc Decision point If invoice details are off Task E Contact supplier or ask AP to hold invoice until corrected version is sent Possibly escalate Actually transcript says If somethings off contact supplier directly or ask Mary to hold the invoice Possibly a branch if discrepancy is minor ask AP to hold and wait for correction if not resolved easily escalate to supervisor If details are correct Task F Send confirmation email back to Accounts Payable Dan Step E After Purchasing confirmation Mary performs matching of invoice line items with the PO in system Decision point Check if all matches If match is successful then process goes to Manager for approval If discrepancy found Task G Email Purchasing team for clarification Possibly escalate to Supervisor Rita if unresolved Step F Send invoice to department manager Carlos for final approval Carlos reviews details and if suspicious may reject or ask Mary to hold for investigation Decision point If manager approves then process goes on if rejects then exception path triggered Possibly escalate or mark as rework Task H Schedule invoice for payment Accounts Payable Clerk does this End event Invoice scheduled for payment

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Additionally in the transcripts there is an exception Ritas transcript If Mary cant match invoice or if Purchasing has issues she escalates to Supervisor In that case Supervisor Rita contacts supplierscoordinates between departments and may either create retrospective PO or decide rejection Karens role Supplier Relationship Manager gets involved if invoice doesnt match terms eg missing PO number or pricing discrepancy I can incorporate those as exception branches
